publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4184 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Education (Additional Support for Learning) (Scotland) Billâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Education (Additional Support for Learning) (Scotland) Bill, debate on groups of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time limits indicated, that time limit being calculated from when the Stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when a meeting of the Parliament is suspended (other than a suspension following the first division in the Stage being called) or otherwise not in progress: Groups 1 to 3: 45 minutes Groups 4 to 7: 1 hour 25 minutes Groups 8 to 10: 1 hour 55 minutes. Supported by: Adam Ingram*
